name: Armatura
description:
This project was created as a part of 2022 Junior/Senior Collaberation Project. This is team 13's submission where we made Armatura, the game of gun volleyball.

The idea behind this was to create a project that took a sport and added a twist to it to make it unique and fun and we settled on taking the idea of Volleyball and adding shotguns to it!
